ygData.subject: Re: Bone chips
ygData.msgSnippet: Who in Halas has these items? Naeeldar ... From: Heath  To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com  Date: Friday, October
ygData.messageBody:
Who in Halas has these items?

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Heath <Merxion@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 01, 1999 10:48 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Bone chips


>From: "Heath" <Merxion@...>
>
>Halas there is a virtually unlimited supply. Make a mule character bring
it
>to bb do a drop trade in a safe place. send him back I have been able to
>bring all back packs full the two times I have done this.
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 10:50 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Bone chips
>
>
>> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>>
>> You do? Hmm, I guess I am just lucky. I usually hunt
>> the monolith/rune in Nektulos. While hunting I auction
>> for bone chips. I usually get about 80 in 30 minutes
>> or so.
>>
>>
>> --- Naeeldar <jackal@...> wrote:
>>
>> <HR>
>> <html>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> I used to do that now I have a lot more problems
>> getting bone chips from
>> newbies and I usually offer 4pp for 20 or so. I'd like
>> to see bone chips on
>> vendors and for all I care they can just raise the
>> price.
>>
>> Naeeldar
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Mark Muller <markm@...>
>> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>> <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>> Date: Thursday, September 30, 1999 11:44 AM
>> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Bone chips
>>
>>
>> >From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>> >
>> >We also have the *cheapest* pet component by
>> far...and yes, there is a
>> >limitless supply...they're called newbies. :)
>> >
>> >Go into nektulous and auction that you're buying bone
>> chips at 1p per 10,
>> >newbies will *flock* to you.
>> >
>> >----- Original Message -----
>> >From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> >To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>> >Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 9:03 AM
>> >Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Bone chips
>> >
>> >
>> >> From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> >>
>> >> Unfortunately no. You may find bone chips on
>> vendors,
>> >> but its only because players have sold some back.
>> This
>> >> is one of the complaints that is being petitioned
>> >> about all the time by necros, since every other pet
>> >> class has unlimited supply vendors, while we don't.
>> >
>> >>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive
>> language will not be
>> tolerated
>> >
>>
>> --
>> This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive
>> language will not be tolerated
>>
>> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not
be
>tolerated
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
